LanguageData.RitualUnbladderingTriggerExtraDesc: Unbladdering is expected for each current and joining {IDEOMEMBER} colonist.
LanguageData.RitualOutcomeExtraDesc_UnbladderingPsyli: Thanks to a satisfying unbladdering ritual, {PAWN_labelShort} gained a psylink level!
LanguageData.MessageClothDestroyedByAccident: {PAWN_labelShort} destroyed {PAWN_possessive} {CLOTH_labelShort} by having a little accident.
